title: [TOOLTIP BUG] Scavenging Smite Tooltip Incorrect
body: Scavenging Smite(Poacher's Knife) says that it recharges a smite charge every 15 seconds while in reality it recharges every 75 seconds.

replies.body: Might have been here a while since no one really buys Poacher's

That has been there since they changed smite to have charges

LOL

This would definitely be a bug, but imagine how much better Poacher's Knife would be if its cooldown was actually this.

And it still would probably be bad. It would just be less bad. Unless being able to smite every single jungle camp is that good.

Actually, it would be.      Ensuring you always, always had smite up for invades and your own jungle is a pretty useful thing (hint, think of all the smite buffs you can keep up constantly).  80% CDR on smite is nothing to scoff at.
